MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the TD10 and TD11 postcode areas of Duns. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:23am. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our engineers have arrived on site in the local area to investigate the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:12am on Sunday 28th March 2021
